trans-unit.resname: OAFC·1 | Galea, Kindler of Hope | Card Name
OAFC·1 | Galea, Kindler of Hope | Card Text | Paragraph 1
OAFC·1 | Galea, Kindler of Hope | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: You may look at the top card of your library any time.
trans-unit.target: You may look at the top card of your library any time.

trans-unit.resname: OAFC·1 | Galea, Kindler of Hope | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: You may cast Aura and Equipment spells from the top of your library. When you cast an Equipment spell this way, it gains "When this Equipment enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control."
trans-unit.target: You may cast Aura and Equipment spells from the top of your library. When you cast an Equipment spell this way, it gains "When this Equipment enters the battlefield, attach it to target creature you control."

trans-unit.resname: OAFC·2 | Prosper, Tome-Bound | Card Text | Paragraph 1
OAFC·2 | Prosper, Tome-Bound | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Mystic Arcanum — At the beginning of your end step, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.
trans-unit.target: Mystic Arcanum — At the beginning of your end step, exile the top card of your library. Until the end of your next turn, you may play that card.

trans-unit.resname: OAFC·2 | Prosper, Tome-Bound | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Pact Boon — Whenever you play a card from exile, create a Treasure token.
trans-unit.target: Pact Boon — Whenever you play a card from exile, create a Treasure token.

trans-unit.resname: OAFC·3 | Sefris of the Hidden Ways | Card Name
OAFC·3 | Sefris of the Hidden Ways | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creature cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere, venture into the dungeon. This ability triggers only once each turn. (To venture into the dungeon, enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
trans-unit.target: Whenever one or more creature cards are put into your graveyard from anywhere, venture into the dungeon. This ability triggers only once each turn. (To venture into the dungeon, enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

trans-unit.resname: OAFC·3 | Sefris of the Hidden Ways | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Create Undead — Whenever you complete a dungeon, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: Create Undead — Whenever you complete a dungeon, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

trans-unit.resname: OAFC·4 | Vrondiss, Rage of Ancients | Card Name
OAFC·4 | Vrondiss, Rage of Ancients | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enrage — Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, you may create a 5/4 red and green Dragon Spirit creature token with "When this creature deals damage, sacrifice it."
trans-unit.target: Enrage — Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, you may create a 5/4 red and green Dragon Spirit creature token with "When this creature deals damage, sacrifice it."

trans-unit.resname: OAFC·4 | Vrondiss, Rage of Ancients | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever you roll one or more dice, you may have Vrondiss deal 1 damage to itself.
trans-unit.target: Whenever you roll one or more dice, you may have Vrondiss deal 1 damage to itself.
